category.name: DIS Adapter
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VIS_view_nx_prt_as_2d
preference.preference_description: Allows visualization of part files (.prt extension) with embedded CGM data in either 2D or 3D format in Lifecycle Visualization. Valid Values: * true: to view in 2D * false: to view in 3D. This is default value.
